tool_description: Introducing the ultimate art event API for Italy - your one-stop destination for discovering and experiencing the best art events happening across the country. With our API, you have access to a comprehensive list of cities where art events take place, as well as a list of ongoing events happening in each city.
name: Art openings Italy
title: Art openings Italy

api_list.name: Events Detail
api_list.description: This service returns all data related to a specific id. The id field in the example you provided is a unique identifier for the event. It is a string of characters that follows the format of a universally unique identifier (UUID), which is a standardized way of generating a 128-bit identifier that is guaranteed to be unique across all devices and all time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://art-openings-italy.p.rapidapi.com/api/events/77d10935-79de-4639-82e8-74e76a75b385"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "art-openings-italy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://art-openings-italy.p.rapidapi.com/api/events/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "art-openings-italy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Live events
api_list.description: To call this service, you would make a GET request to the endpoint /api/ongoing-events with the optional query parameter city. When the service is called, it retrieves a list of events from the database, filtered by the city parameter if it is provided.

api_list.name: Health check
api_list.description: The service it allows you to monitor if the application is up time. It returns an healthcheck object that has three properties uptime , message and timestamp.

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "art-openings-italy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
